languages.text: {n}Чистоголосый пророк исчез в одну ночь. На полу его покоев нашли лишь странное изображение лабиринта, начертанное его кровью. Паства легко уверовала, что сей загадочный знак есть место вознесения "святого Когнация" к Императору, и сделала келью местом поклонения.{/n}

{n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet disappeared in a single night. They found only a strange image of a labyrinth inscribed in his blood on the floor of his chamber. His followers gladly believed that this mysterious sign marked the ascension of "Saint Cognatius" to the Emperor, and made the cell a place of worship.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Чистоголосый пророк исчез в одну ночь. На полу его покоев нашли лишь странное изображение лабиринта, начертанное его кровью. Паства легко уверовала, что сей загадочный знак есть место вознесения "святого Когнация" к Императору, и сделала келью местом поклонения.{/n}

The flock gladly believed that this mysterious sign was the place of the ascension of "Saint Cognatius" to the Emperor, and made the cell a place of worship.{/n}

His followers gladly believed that this mysterious sign marked the ascension of "Saint Cognatius" to the Emperor, and made the cell a place of worship.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Prophet mit der Reinen Stimme ist in einer Nacht verschwunden. Man fand nur das seltsame Bild eines Labyrinths, das er mit seinem Blut auf den Boden seiner Kammer gezeichnet hatte. Seine Gefolgsleute glaubten, dass dieses mysteriöse Zeichen den Aufstieg von "St. Cognatius" zum Imperator markierte und machten die Zelle zu einer Pilgerstätte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet disappeared in a single night. They found only a strange image of a labyrinth inscribed in his blood on the floor of his chamber. His followers gladly believed that this mysterious sign marked the ascension of "Saint Cognatius" to the Emperor, and made the cell a place of worship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Prophet mit der Reinen Stimme ist in einer Nacht verschwunden. Man fand nur das seltsame Bild eines Labyrinths, das er mit seinem Blut auf den Boden seiner Kammer gezeichnet hatte. Seine Gefolgsleute glaubten, dass dieses mysteriöse Zeichen den Aufstieg von "St. Cognatius" zum Imperator markierte und machten die Zelle zu einer Pilgerstätte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le prophète à la voix pure a disparu du jour au lendemain. Tout ce qu'on a retrouvé, c'est un étrange labyrinthe tracé en lignes de sang, sur le sol de sa cabine. Ses disciples l'ont interprété comme un signe mystérieux de l'ascension de « Saint Cognatius », parti rejoindre le giron de l'Empereur, et ont transformé sa cellule en lieu de culte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet disappeared in a single night. They found only a strange image of a labyrinth inscribed in his blood on the floor of his chamber. His followers gladly believed that this mysterious sign marked the ascension of "Saint Cognatius" to the Emperor, and made the cell a place of worship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le prophète à la voix pure a disparu du jour au lendemain. Tout ce qu'on a retrouvé, c'est un étrange labyrinthe tracé en lignes de sang, sur le sol de sa cabine. Ses disciples l'ont interprété comme un signe mystérieux de l'ascension de « Saint Cognatius », parti rejoindre le giron de l'Empereur, et ont transformé sa cellule en lieu de culte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El profeta de voz pura desapareció en una sola noche. Solo encontraron una extraña imagen de un laberinto dibujada en el suelo de sus aposentos. Sus seguidores aceptaron de buen grado que esta misteriosa señal marcaba la ascensión de «san Cognatius» al Emperador y convirtieron su celda en un lugar de culto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet disappeared in a single night. They found only a strange image of a labyrinth inscribed in his blood on the floor of his chamber. His followers gladly believed that this mysterious sign marked the ascension of "Saint Cognatius" to the Emperor, and made the cell a place of worship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El profeta de voz pura desapareció en una sola noche. Solo encontraron una extraña imagen de un laberinto dibujada en el suelo de sus aposentos. Sus seguidores aceptaron de buen grado que esta misteriosa señal marcaba la ascensión de «San Cognatius» al Emperador y convirtieron su celda en un lugar de culto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}純真な声を持つ預言者は、一夜にして姿を消した。彼の部屋の床には、その地で刻まれた奇妙な迷宮の画だけが残されていた。彼の信奉者たちは、この不思議な印こそが「聖コグナティウス」が皇帝の許へと昇華した証だと嬉々として信じ、その独房を礼拝の場とした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet disappeared in a single night. They found only a strange image of a labyrinth inscribed in his blood on the floor of his chamber. His followers gladly believed that this mysterious sign marked the ascension of "Saint Cognatius" to the Emperor, and made the cell a place of worship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}純真な声を持つ預言者は、一夜にして姿を消した。彼の部屋の床には、その地で刻まれた奇妙な迷宮の画だけが残されていた。彼の信奉者たちは、この不思議な印こそが「聖コグナティウス」が皇帝の許へと昇華した証だと嬉々として信じ、その独房を礼拝の場とした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}纯洁之声先知一夜之间就没了踪影，他的信徒们只在他房间的地板上发现了用他的鲜血刻成的古怪迷宫图案。他的追随者们虔诚地相信，这个神秘的记号代表着“圣科尼亚蒂乌斯”已经回到了帝皇身边，而这件房间也由此成为了礼拜的圣所。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet disappeared in a single night. They found only a strange image of a labyrinth inscribed in his blood on the floor of his chamber. His followers gladly believed that this mysterious sign marked the ascension of "Saint Cognatius" to the Emperor, and made the cell a place of worship.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Peygamber Durusöz, bir gece ortadan kayboldu. Odasının zemininde kanıyla çizilmiş, ilginç bir labirent resmi buldular. Takipçileri, bu gizemli işaretin "Aziz Cognatius"un İmparator'a yükselişini işaret ettiğine inanıp hücreyi ibadetgâh bellediler.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet disappeared in a single night. They found only a strange image of a labyrinth inscribed in his blood on the floor of his chamber. His followers gladly believed that this mysterious sign marked the ascension of "Saint Cognatius" to the Emperor, and made the cell a place of worship.{/n}
